summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Third Avenue Northwest from Kilbourne Street to West Forty-fifth Street et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks etc under Ordinance No. 14977, creating Local Improvement District No. 1331 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
